name: Indoor (NikitaM, babosik)
description:
Use "WASD" to move

Use "E" to repair

Use "Z" or "X" to switch camera

Find and repair all the generators to escape this mystical place.

Stand on the green circle and hold "E" to start repairing the generator.

When the generator is fixed, run or hide! Before the unknown comes and finds you.

Run and hide from the unknown behind boxes and other objects, don't let him catch you.

Follow the location of the monster on the cameras, control the situation so that you are not taken by surprise.

Game by: NikitaM, babosik
